content: the **endless comfort blanket square** is a cozy crochet square pattern featuring a simple **2-round repeat** the pattern includes instructions for a **6 inch square** or a **12 inch square** and you can keep crocheting the repeat to make a **square blanket in any size** this pattern includes instructions for a **6 inch square** a **12 inch square** continuing the repeat to make a **square blanket in any size** **includes ** round-by-round photos **the free written pattern will be available at 12 01 am et new york time on january 12 2026 ** **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2026 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
